name: REPUBLIC WESTERN INSURANCE COMPANY, Objector v. RELIANCE INSURANCE COMPANY IN LIQUIDATION (Ancillary Matter to in Re: Reliance Insurance Company in Liquidation, No. 1 Rel 2001). Appeal of Republic Western Insurance Company, Objector
name_abbreviation: Republic Western Insurance v. Reliance Insurance Co. in Liquidation

parties: REPUBLIC WESTERN INSURANCE COMPANY, Objector v. RELIANCE INSURANCE COMPANY IN LIQUIDATION (Ancillary Matter to in Re: Reliance Insurance Company in Liquidation, No. 1 Rel 2001). Appeal of Republic Western Insurance Company, Objector.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of October, 2013, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED. Appellant’s “request for leave to present oral argument is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
78 A.3d 1058
REPUBLIC WESTERN INSURANCE COMPANY, Objector v. RELIANCE INSURANCE COMPANY IN LIQUIDATION (Ancillary Matter to in Re: Reliance Insurance Company in Liquidation, No. 1 Rel 2001). Appeal of Republic Western Insurance Company, Objector.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 30, 2013.
